channel.title: RuneScape 2011/2012 Site Rip
channel.description:
Hey guys, I ripped this site a few weeks back and if I'm being honest after going to the effort of spending about an hour fixing out images and folders from their website I couldn't be bothered screwing with the index and editing it to my sites stuff. There's a screenshot of it below but you might as well just download it, there's no viruses, someone do a virus scan if you wish. All I ask for this is that if you use it please give credits to me - Ruby. If anyone would like a website ripped or a website made please just inbox me on this or inbox me [url=http://"http://motionxscape.com/forum/forum.php"] here.[/url]
Screenshot - [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2q9gvol.jpg[/img]
I hope you enjoy it, here's the link: [url=http://www.filedropper.com/runescapesiterip] RuneScape Site Rip By Ruby.[/url]
CREDITS - JaGeX - 99.9% - Me - 0.1%.
Thanks, Ruby.

Junkeh:

Easiest thing in the world to do…

I never said it was hard mate. It’s released for kids to use, it’s better on here than it is on my desktop.

[quote=“StubernSnake, post:25, topic:431328”]This is not helpful as if runescape take down there images. Whoever uses this, there images will go down aswell unless they host the images.
This is 100% useless.
Not worth a release.[/quote]

The images are in the files there so they’re hosted independently, so in actual fact, no, their images won’t go down.

item.title: RuneScape 2011/2012 Site Rip
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“CoderJessee, post:12, topic:431328”][quote author=562-Pro link=topic=534006.msg3903885#msg3903885 date=1328038137]
is there a way you can make this into your own website eg. change the link to
your rsps’s name and make the play now work and make it go to your rsps’s
webclient if so please tell :P?
[/quote]

Yes.

Copy the whole HTML code, and paste it into your website’s HTML Source. If I was you, I should use 000Webhost.com for this.[/quote]

  1. edit it on your desktop. don’t copy and paste it anywhere because you’ll misplace something or other and the whole site must be redone. I suggest if you have no money using 000webhost, but if you have 7$ buy the infinity package from x10hosting, its extremely reliable and worth the money.

Read full topic

your rsps’s name and make the play now work and make it go to your rsps’s

Copy the whole HTML code, and paste it into your website’s HTML Source. If I was you, I should use 000Webhost.com for this.

item.title: RuneScape 2011/2012 Site Rip
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

CoderJessee:

Well but why would u use this? Its a totally leech & I guess NO1 will take time to change EVERYTHING to his own server’s name.

Plenty of people use rs lookalikes and rs sites, some people like the look of them. I’m not asking you to use it so I don’t see what’s wrong with it. Some people leech things because they haven’t got the money to either develop or buy a custom one. And in addition to that, it doesn’t take much to change EVERYTHING as you call it. Just change links about and copy and paste your banner into the header.

Read full topic
